attributes.action: dramatically increase the punishments given to criminals who commit offences under any act of Parliament, which protects wildlife or wild places etc.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you intentionally set out to kill wildlife, don't worry...  the law says you only have to pay a fine.  If you kill an animal without just course (ie. to prevent disease / prevent suffering etc.) it is still murder.
